thread.section_title: Luxury Of Watches Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxury Of Watches | luxuryofwatches.com
thread.title: Philip
thread.title_full: Luxury Of Watches reviewed by Philip

author: Philip
title: Philip
text: Contacted their customer service to confirm availability and then placed my order over the phone. They were very helpful and had exactly what I was looking for in stock.Item arrived in 3 days and was packaged in some of the best packaging I've seen. Nice selection of watches and very good pricing. Didn't receive a certificate of authenticity otherwise I would have given a 5 star rating.
